## {{< fa bullseye >}} Learning Objectives


::: {.cell}

:::


1. Learners can describe the key ethical concerns related to using AI (human bias, misinformation, privacy, security, etc.)
2. Learners are aware of the responsibility for using AI and critically and evaluating all its output.
3. Learners can explain the basics of AI and its potential for improving software development workflows
